question.questionText: Weishenme yan keyi tongguo lvzhi danshi shazi que liu le xialai?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: yinwei yankeli zugou xiao, shaozi keli tai da le.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Yan rongyu shui, shaozi bu rongyu shui.
Yinwei yanshui shi rongye, shaozi shui shi hunhewu.
yin wei shazi limian you shitou
